GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19 to before v4.19.264
GSD.description:
mm: /proc/pid/smaps_rollup: fix no vma's null-deref

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.264 by commit dbe863bce7679c7f5ec0e993d834fe16c5e687b5, it was introduced in version v4.19 by commit 258f669e7e88c18edbc23fe5ce00a476b924551f. For more details please see the references link.
